data.title: Pushing Ice by Alastair Reynolds, Paperback
data.meta_description: Used copy of Pushing Ice by Alastair Reynolds sold on Pangobooks.
data.text:
Seller Description

2007 Ace SCI-Fi paperback edition. Clean text. Tight binding. No markings and no bent pages. Light edge fading of pages. Cover has a few light edge scuffs, but otherwise in nice shape with no scratches or creases. Good copy.

Additional Information

Pushing Ice

ISBN: 9780441015023

Publisher Description

2057. Bella Lind and the crew of her nuclearpowered ship, the Rockhopper, push ice. They mine comets. But when Janus, one of Saturn's ice moons, inexplicably leaves its natural orbit and heads out of ...

Read more
